```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

#load hte tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

#set the default theme for all graphs
theme_set(theme_light())
```

## Fake Data  

First, let's read in the data.  
```{r}
fake_data <- read_csv("fake_data.csv")
```

### Proximity  

```{r}
fake_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, y = Response)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = Factor2), 
           position = position_dodge(),
           color = "black") 
```

### Encolsure + Proximity 

```{r}
fake_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, y = Response)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = Factor2),
           color = "black") +
  facet_wrap(~Factor2) 
```

### Similarity  

```{r}
fake_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, y = Response)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = Factor2,
                 color = Factor2), 
             size = 6)
```

### Similarity + Connection

```{r}
fake_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, y = Response)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = Factor2,
                 color = Factor2), 
             size = 6) +
  geom_line(aes(group = Factor2,
                color = Factor2), 
            size = 2) 
```

### Similarity + Connection

```{r}
fake_data |> 
  mutate(is_A = (Factor2 == "A")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, 
             y = Response, 
             color = is_A)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = Factor2), 
             size = 6) +
  geom_line(aes(group = Factor2), 
            linewidth = 2) +
  guides(color = "none")
```


### Enclosure + Similarity + Connection

```{r}
fake_data |>
  mutate(is_A = (Factor2 == "A")) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Factor1, 
             y = Response, 
             color = is_A)) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = Factor2), 
             size = 6) +
  geom_line(aes(group = Factor2), 
            linewidth = 2) +
  guides(color = "none") +
  geom_rect(xmin = 0.75, xmax = 1.25, ymin = 2, ymax = 17, 
            fill = "beige", alpha = 0.1, color = "black") +
  geom_rect(xmin = 1.75, xmax = 3.25, ymin = 2, ymax = 17, 
            fill = "beige", alpha = 0.1, color = "black")

```
